description:
Ishii is a fellow student at the Asunaro Private High School. He asks http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Wakatsuki Nico] to meet him under the famous "love-knot tree" (enmusubi no ki 縁結びの木) during the school field trip.
At first Nico was wary thinking that he wanted to confess to her. To her surprise Ishii brought with him a group of other boys who then asked her to give them a love charm instead.
name: Ishii
